name: Leonardo Ai
description: Leonardo Ai is a versatile creative AI platform focused on image generation, particularly popular for game assets, concept art, and diverse artistic styles. It offers a suite of tools including model training and an interactive canvas.
features: Wide array of fine-tuned models (photorealism, anime, fantasy, etc.)

pricing.free_tier: Daily allocation of tokens (e.g., 150) for basic usage.

paid_tiers.name: Apprentice
paid_tiers.description: Increased monthly tokens, faster speeds, more features.

paid_tiers.name: Artisan
paid_tiers.description: More tokens, premium features, API access.

pricing.notes: Tokens consumed for generation and specific features. Heavy use requires paid plans. Potential token rollover on some plans.

pros: Wide variety of high-quality, specialized models
Strong feature set for game asset creation
User-friendly interface with integrated editing tools
cons: Token system can be complex; heavy use needs paid plans
Output quality consistency depends on model/prompt
Some advanced features require higher tiers/more tokens

technical_specifications.sdks: None explicitly mentioned, but API available

performance_metrics.latency: Depends on subscription tier and settings

security_compliance.data_protection: Governed by standard ToS and Privacy Policy. Paid tiers offer private generations. User control over image use for training.
